main.metadata.description: Locaplus specializes in canopy and event tent rentals across the Eastern Townships, providing high-quality tents, chairs, tables, and equipment for festivals, weddings, and special events. Serving Bromont, Granby, South Shore, Sherbrooke, and Magog since 1991.
home.title: Trusted Tent & Event Rentals in the Eastern Townships
home.subtitle: With 30+ years of experience Locaplus delivers reliable tent event rentals to make your event unforgettable.
about.title: Transforming Moments into Memories, Rain or Shine
about.section1.title: 30+ Years of Rental Experience
about.section1.description: Locaplus brings decades of expertise to ensure your event runs smoothly, from intimate gatherings to large festivals across Quebec.
about.section2.title: Premium Tents & Equipment
about.section2.description: Our high-quality tents, tables, chairs, and flooring are designed to elevate any event, rain or shine.
about.section3.title: Tailored Event Solutions
about.section3.description: We offer customized rentals to match your event's unique needs, creating unforgettable moments every time.
about.section4.title: Official distributor and installer for Tempo shelters in the Eastern Townships
about.section4.description: Locaplus is the official Tempo dealer in the Eastern Townships, providing sales, distribution, and expert installation.
products.title: We've got you covered
products.description: Premium tents, stylish furniture, and all the essentials to make your event seamless and unforgettable.
contact.title: Have Questions? Ask Us!
contact.description: Looking for reliable event rentals? Locaplus offers premium tents and equipment across Bromont, Granby, South Shore, Sherbrooke, and Magog. Reach out or request a quote below!
requestQuote.title: Request a quote
requestQuote.success.title: Quote Request Submitted Successfully
requestQuote.success.message: You will receive an automated email confirmation. A team member will follow up with you shortly.
requestQuote.maintenance: The quote form will be unavailable until January 5th. Please send all quote requests to contact@locaplus.net. We apologize for the inconvenience.
error.sendEmail.generic: An error occured while sending email
privacyPolicy.checkbox.text: I have read and agree to the
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At Locaplus, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.
privacyPolicy.infoCollection.title: Information We Collect
privacyPolicy.infoCollection.description: When you fill out the quote request form on our website, we collect the information you provide, such as your name, email address, phone number, and event details.
privacyPolicy.howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
privacyPolicy.howWeUse.description: The information you provide is used solely to respond to your request and provide a quote. We do not store your personal information beyond what is necessary to reply to your inquiry.
privacyPolicy.retention.title: Retention of Information
privacyPolicy.retention.description: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, or as required by law.
privacyPolicy.protection.title: Protection of Your Information
privacyPolicy.protection.description: We take reasonable steps to ensure the information you provide is securely transmitted.
privacyPolicy.contact.title: Contact Us
privacyPolicy.contactInfo: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at
